name: Student
text: Mr. Joseph, do we need to get into forest ?

name: Joseph
text: Well, the factory was lined at the center of the forest. We got no choice

name: Joseph
text: There might be a dangerous monster nearby, so do not let your guard down

name: Joseph
text: Even I said that, the factory is full of the expertise.

name: Joseph
text: We might got nothing to worry about.
